v.v: My God and King, I will proclaim that you are very great;
Every day I will praise you;
Yahweh, you are great, and you ought to be praised very much;
Parents will tell their children the things that you have done;
I will think about how you are very glorious and majestic,
People will speak about your powerful and awesome deeds,
People will remember and proclaim that you are very good to us,
Yahweh, you act kindly and mercifully toward us;
Yahweh, you are good to everyone,
Yahweh, all the creatures that you made will thank you,
They will tell others that you rule very gloriously as our king
They will do that so that everyone will know about your powerful deeds
You will never stop being king;
Yahweh, you help all those who are discouraged,
All of the creatures that you made expect that you will provide food for them,
You give food to all living creatures generously,
Everything that Yahweh does, he does justly;
Yahweh comes near to all those who call out to him,
To all those who have an awesome respect for him he gives what they need.
Yahweh protects all those who love him,
I will always praise Yahweh;

v: I will praise you now and forever.
Yes, I will praise you forever.
we cannot fully realize how great you are.
they will tell their children about your mighty deeds.
and I will meditate on all your wonderful deeds.
and I will proclaim that you are very great.
and they will sing joyfully that you always act justly.
you do not quickly become angry;
you faithfully love us very much as you have promised to do.
and you act mercifully to everything that you have made.
and all your people will praise you.
and that you are very powerful.
and that you rule over us gloriously.
you will rule throughout all generations.
and you lift up all those who have lost hope.
and you give them food when they need it.
and you cause them to be satisfied.
all that he does, he does mercifully.
to those who call to him sincerely.
He hears them when they cry out to him and saves them.
but he will get rid of all the wicked people.
I wish that all people everywhere may praise him forever, for he does everything perfectly.
